code: var formatDate=function formatDate(date){var d=new Date(date);var month="".concat(d.getMonth()+1);var day="".concat(d.getDate());var year=d.getFullYear();if(month.length<2){month="0".concat(month);}if(day.length<2){day="0".concat(day);}return[year,month,day].join('-');};export default formatDate;
